text.p: FiJI is a Free Java Installer released under GPL. It enables you to distribute your applications with easy installation : the user doesn't have to edit lauching scripts (to modify a CLASSPATH for instance).
This program needs a recent Java virtual machine (1.2 or 1.3). To install it, go the directory where you download the archive and type java -jar fiji-&version;.jar on the command line.
Please read the documentation in the doc directory for full installation explanation and user guide.
